ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: My problem with this song is the concept.  If this is indeed a Desperate Dirge , that can only be used once every 40 minutes (the longest timer of any effect
ygData.messageBody:
My problem with this song is the concept. If this is indeed a "Desperate Dirge", that can only be used
once every 40 minutes (the longest timer of any effect in the game, if I'm not mistaken), it should, in at
least some small number of expected circumstances, have a significant effect. It doesn't. By the time
you get it, the amount of damage it does is inconsequential to the eventual outcome of any fight, and is
actually much more likely to be detrimental due to the AE component (which wakes up anything mezzed)
coupled with the ludicrous resists (which wakes up anything mezzed, frequently without damaging them in
the slightest). And the level increases that Verant gave to this song are laughably small compared to the
increased HP total of higher-level MOBs. They really have no clue.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk


"Kimes, Dean W." wrote:

> I am inconvenienced only in that we were theoretically limited to one song
> per level and I don't get one at that level due to 7% of the people. If
> they add in another song at the level that is useful, problem solved. My
> whole point is DDD is pathetic. Pillar of Frost can be chain cast 7 times
> by a 51st level wizard for far more effect.
